articles.title: Newly discovered Leptanilla ant named after Harry Potter villain - Earth.com
articles.description: A new ant species, Leptanilla Voldemort, has been discovered in the stark and ancient Pilbara region of northwestern Australia
articles.content:
A new ant species, Leptanilla Voldemort, has been discovered in the stark and ancient Pilbara region of northwestern Australia, a place known for its relentless sun and minimal rainfall.
